trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}' and tenant '{1}'. Select 'Link account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{2}'
trans-unit.target: 存取選取的帳戶 '{0}' 及租用戶 '{1}' 時發生錯誤。請選取 [連結帳戶]，然後重新整理帳戶或選取其他帳戶。錯誤 '{2}'

trans-unit.source: The access token for selected account '{0}' and tenant '{1}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.
trans-unit.target: 選取的帳戶 '{0}' 及租用戶 '{1}' 的存取權杖已失效。請選取 [連結帳戶] 並重新整理該帳戶，或選取其他帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Migration service component could not start. {0}
trans-unit.target: 移轉服務元件無法啟動。{0}

trans-unit.source: Service provider could not be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 無法初始化服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Migrate logins from '{0}' to Azure SQL
trans-unit.target: 將登入從 '{0}' 移轉至 Azure SQL
將 '{0}' 移轉到 Azure SQL

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this migration?
Azure Active Directory Domain Name (only required to migrate Windows Authenication Logins)
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory 網域名稱 (僅需要移轉 Windows 驗證登入)
輸入 AAD 網域名稱

trans-unit.source: Collecting target login failed with error code {0}
trans-unit.target: 收集目標登入失敗，錯誤碼為 {0}

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (AAD) Domain name is required to migrate Windows login. Please enter an AAD Domain Name or deselect windows login(s).
trans-unit.target: 需要 Azure Active Directory (AAD) 網域名稱才能移轉 Windows 登入。請輸入 AAD 網域名稱或取消選取 Windows 登入。

trans-unit.source:
Validating and migrating logins completed.
Establishing user mappings.
trans-unit.target:
驗證及移轉登入已完成。
正在建立使用者對應。

trans-unit.source: SELECT sp.name as login, sp.type_desc as login_type, sp.default_database_name, case when sp.is_disabled = 1 then 'Disabled' else 'Enabled' end as status FROM sys.server_principals sp LEFT JOIN sys.sql_logins sl ON sp.principal_id = sl.principal_id WHERE sp.type NOT IN ('G', 'R') AND sp.type_desc IN ('SQL_LOGIN', 'WINDOWS_LOGIN') ORDER BY sp.name;
trans-unit.target: SELECT sp.name as login, sp.type_desc as login_type, sp.default_database_name, case when sp.is_disabled = 1 then 'Disabled' else 'Enabled' end as status FROM sys.server_principals sp LEFT JOIN sys.sql_logins sl ON sp.principal_id = sl.principal_id WHERE sp.type NOT IN ('G', 'R') AND sp.type_desc IN ('SQL_LOGIN', 'WINDOWS_LOGIN') ORDER BY sp.name;
Azure SQL 受控執行個體

trans-unit.source:
Establishing user mappings completed.
Currently, migrating server roles, establishing server mappings and setting permissions. This will take some time.
trans-unit.target:
建立使用者對應已完成。
目前正在移轉伺服器角色、建立伺服器對應及設定權限。這需要一些時間。

trans-unit.source: Migrating server roles, establishing server mappings and setting permissions failed.
trans-unit.target: 移轉伺服器角色、建立伺服器對應及設定權限失敗。

trans-unit.source: Refreshing login list was successful. Source logins found {0}, Target logins found {1}
trans-unit.target: 重新整理登入清單成功。發現來源登入 {0}，找到目標登入 {1}

trans-unit.source: Refreshing login list from source failed
trans-unit.target: 從來源重新整理登入清單失敗

trans-unit.source: Refreshing login list from target failed
trans-unit.target: 從目標重新整理登入清單失敗

trans-unit.source: Refreshing login list from source and target
trans-unit.target: 正在從來源和目標重新整理登入清單

trans-unit.source: Please note that this wizard does not display windows authentication login types because migrating that type is currently not supported. Capability for migrating windows authentication logins is coming soon.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此精靈不會顯示 Windows 驗證登入類型，因為目前不支援移轉該類型。即將推出移轉 Windows 驗證登入的功能。
正在將 {0} 登入移轉至目標 {1} '{2}'
已完成將 {0} 登入移轉至 {1} '{2}'
無法將 {0} 登入移轉至 {1} '{2}'

trans-unit.source: Login migration has already been initiated and going back to prior page is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 登入移轉已起始，且已停用回到先前頁面的功能。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Please note that login migration feature is in public preview mode.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，登入移轉功能處於公開預覽版模式。

trans-unit.source: Select the target Azure SQL Managed Instance, Azure SQL VM, or Azure SQL database(s) where you want to migrate your logins.
trans-unit.target: 選取您要移轉登入的位置: 目標 Azure SQL 受控執行個體、Azure SQL VM 或 Azure SQL 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Please ensure that the current user has sysadmin permissions to get all login information for the current instance ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 請確定目前的使用者具有系統管理員權限，可取得目前執行個體的所有登入資訊 ({0})。

trans-unit.source: Select the databases that you want to migrate to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 選取要遷移至 Azure SQL 的資料庫。
使用中的備份檔案 (1 個項目)
使用中的備份檔案 ({0} 個項目)
所有欄位都是必要欄位。
(針對 {0} 個已評定的資料庫)

trans-unit.source: The assessment of your SQL Server instance '{0}' failed.
trans-unit.target: 評定您的 SQL Server 執行個體 '{0}' 失敗。

trans-unit.source:
We are assessing the databases in your SQL Server instance {0} to identify the right Azure SQL target.
This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
我們正在評估您 SQL Server 執行個體 {0} 中的資料庫，以識別正確的 Azure SQL 目標。
這可能需要一些時間。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance or Azure SQL Database can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: 尚未準備好移轉到 Azure SQL 受控執行個體或 Azure SQL Database 的資料庫，可以在 Azure 虛擬機器上移轉到 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Database can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines. Alternatively, review assessment results for Azure SQL Managed Instance migration readiness.
trans-unit.target: 尚未準備好移轉至 Azure SQL Database 的資料庫可以移轉至 Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server。或者，檢閱 Azure SQL 受控執行個體移轉整備程度的評定結果。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines. Alternatively, review assessment results for Azure SQL Database migration readiness.
trans-unit.target: 尚未準備好移轉至 Azure SQL 受控執行個體的資料庫可以移轉至 Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server。或者，檢閱 Azure SQL Database 移轉整備程度的評定結果。

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking issue that will prevent the database migration from succeeding.
trans-unit.target: 這是會導致資料庫移轉無法成功的執行問題。
Azure SQL 受控執行個體

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server
Azure VM 上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Azure Storage account to upload backups
trans-unit.target: 要上傳備份的 Azure 儲存體帳戶

trans-unit.source: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
trans-unit.target: 因為必須將三個次要複本設為 Always On 高可用性群組，所以企業關鍵服務層的 SQL 受控執行個體完全移轉所花費的時間會明顯超出一般用途。作業的持續時間取決於資料的大小。90% 案例的植入速度為 220 GB/小時或更高。

trans-unit.source: Select a blob container value first.
trans-unit.target: 請先選取 BLOb 容器值。

trans-unit.source: Select a resource group value first.

trans-unit.target: Azure 儲存體 Blob 容器詳細資料

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure Storage Blob Container that contains the backups.
trans-unit.target: 提供包含備份的 Azure 儲存體 Blob 容器。

trans-unit.source: Enter target database name and select resource group, storage account and container for the selected source databases.
trans-unit.target: 輸入目標資料庫名稱，然後選取所選源資料庫的資源群組、儲存體帳戶和容器。

trans-unit.source: Select a storage account value first.
trans-unit.target: 請先選取儲存體帳戶值。

trans-unit.source: {0}/{1} databases can be migrated without issues
trans-unit.target: {0}/{1} 個資料庫可以移轉而無問題

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 移轉不在進行中，因此無法取消。

trans-unit.source: Migration is not in progress and cannot be cutover.
trans-unit.target: 移轉不在進行中，且無法完全移轉。

trans-unit.source: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.
trans-unit.target: 在所有移轉完成前，完全移轉程序無法啟動。若要傳回最新的檔案狀態，請重新整理瀏覽器視窗。

trans-unit.source: Completing cutover without restoring all the backups may result in a data loss.
trans-unit.target: 完成完全移轉而不還原所有備份可能會造成資料遺失。

trans-unit.source: I confirm there are no additional log backups to provide and want to complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: 我確認沒有其他記錄備份可提供並想要完成完全移轉。

trans-unit.source: Data movement throughput achieved during the migration of your database backups to Azure. This is the rate of data transfer, calculated by data read divided by duration of backups migration to Azure.
trans-unit.target: 將資料庫備份移轉至 Azure 期間達成的資料移動輸送量。這是資料傳輸速率，由資料讀取除以備份移轉至 Azure 的持續時間計算。
完成完全移轉的資料庫移轉

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while initiating cutover.
trans-unit.target: 起始完全移轉時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: 完成完全移轉前，請執行下列步驟。
資料庫 '{0}' 的完全移轉進行中

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理移轉狀態時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.
trans-unit.target: 1. 停止所有導向來源資料庫的傳入交易。

trans-unit.source: 2. Create a final transaction log differential or backup and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
trans-unit.target: 2. 建立最終交易記錄差異比較或備份，並將它儲存在在 Azure 儲存體 Blob 容器。

trans-unit.source: 2. Create a final transaction log backup and store it on the network share.
trans-unit.target: 2. 建立最終交易記錄備份，並儲存在網路共用上。

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that all backups have been restored on the target database. The "Log backups pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. 確認所有備份已還原到目標資料庫上。[待還原的記錄備份] 值應為零。

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that all log backups have been restored on the target database. The "Log backups pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. 確認所有記錄備份已還原到目標資料庫上。[待還原的記錄備份] 值應為零。

trans-unit.source: Determine the migration readiness of your SQL Server instances, identify a recommended Azure SQL target, and complete the migration of your SQL Server instance to Azure SQL Managed Instance, SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines or Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: 判斷您 SQL Server 執行個體的移轉整備度、識別建議的 Azure SQL 目標，並完成將您的 SQL Server 執行個體移轉到 Azure SQL 受控執行個體、Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server 或 Azure SQL Database。

trans-unit.source: A hub of migration articles that provides step-by-step guidance for migrating and modernizing your data assets in Azure.
trans-unit.target: 移轉文章的中樞，提供在 Azure 中移轉和讓資料資產現代化的逐步指引。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises or Azure Virtual Machines) to Azure SQL Managed Instance with minimal downtime.
trans-unit.target: 將資料庫從 SQL Server 執行個體 (內部部署或 Azure 虛擬機器) 移轉到 Azure SQL 受控執行個體的逐步教學課程，停機時間最短。

trans-unit.source: The Azure SQL Migration extension for Azure Data Studio provides capabilities to assess, get right-sized Azure recommendations and migrate SQL Server databases to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Studio 的 Azure SQL 移轉擴充功能提供評估、取得正確大小的 Azure 建議，以及將 SQL Server 資料庫移轉至 Azure 的功能。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises or Azure Virtual Machines) to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: 將資料庫從 SQL Server 執行個體 (內部部署或 Azure 虛擬機器) 移轉至 Azure SQL 資料庫的逐步教學課程。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises) to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines with minimal downtime.
trans-unit.target: 將資料庫從 SQL Server 執行個體 (內部部署) 移轉到 Azure 虛擬機器上 SQL Server 的逐步教學課程，停機時間最短。

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (online)
trans-unit.target: 教學課程: 移轉至 Azure SQL 受控執行個體 (線上)

trans-unit.source: Migrate databases using Azure Data Studio
trans-unit.target: 使用 Azure Data Studio 來移轉資料庫

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to SQL Server on Azure SQL Database (offline)
trans-unit.target: 教學課程: 移轉至 Azure SQL Database 上的 SQL Server (離線)

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines (online)
trans-unit.target: 教學課程: 在 Azure 虛擬機器上移轉至 SQL Server (線上)
將登入移轉至 Azure SQL

trans-unit.source: Migrate SQL Server logins to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 將 SQL Server 登入移轉至 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: Migrate a SQL Server instance to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 將 SQL Server 執行個體移轉到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the actual amount of data read from the source and the actual amount of data uploaded to the target.
trans-unit.target: 比較從來源讀取的實際資料量，以及上傳至目標的實際資料量。

trans-unit.source: Database '{0}' already exists on the target managed instance '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 目標受控執行個體 '{1}'上已經有資料庫 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the provided database name(s) do not already exist on the target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 請確認提供的資料庫名稱並不存在於 Azure 虛擬機器的目標 SQL Server 上。

trans-unit.source: Select the databases that you want to assess for migration to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 選取您要評定要移轉至 Azure SQL 的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing database details.
trans-unit.target: 存取資料庫詳細資料時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while connecting to target migration database.
trans-unit.target: 連接到目標移轉資料庫時發生錯誤。
正在載入資料庫資料表清單..

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.
trans-unit.target: 若要移轉到 Azure SQL 目標，請根據您的停機需求選擇移轉模式。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime will start when the migration starts.
trans-unit.target: 當移轉開始時，應用程式的停機時間就會開始。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式停機的情況只會發生於移轉結束時的完全移轉期間。
資料庫移轉服務驗證金鑰

trans-unit.source: Successfully created a Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 已成功建立資料庫移轉服務。

trans-unit.source: Select the location of the database backups to use during migration.
trans-unit.target: 選取要於移轉期間使用的資料庫備份位置。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, select tables in each database for migration.
trans-unit.target: 若要移轉至 Azure SQL 目標，請在每個資料庫中選取資料表以進行移轉。

trans-unit.source: Please select target database tables to migrate to. At least one database with one table is required.
trans-unit.target: 請選取要移轉至的目標資料庫資料表。至少需要一個具有一個資料表的資料庫。
選取了 {0} 個資料庫 (共 {1} 個)

trans-unit.source: Filter table migration results using keywords
trans-unit.target: 使用關鍵字篩選資料表移轉結果

trans-unit.source: Azure region for your Azure Database Migration Service. Only regions that contain a service will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure 資料庫移轉服務的 Azure 區域。只會顯示包含服務的區域。

trans-unit.source: Failed to provision a Database Migration Service. Wait a few minutes and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法佈建資料庫移轉服務。請稍待幾分鐘後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Your Azure Database Migration Service resource name
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure 資料庫移轉服務資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Resource group for your Azure SQL target. Only resource groups that contain a service will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure SQL 目標的資源群組。只會顯示包含服務的資源群組。

trans-unit.source: Subscription name for your Azure Database Migration Service
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務的訂用帳戶名稱

trans-unit.source: If results were expected, verify the connection to the SQL Server instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果預期結果，請驗證 SQL Server 執行個體的連線。

trans-unit.source: Enter the credentials for the source SQL Server instance. These credentials will be used while migrating databases to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 輸入來源 SQL Server 執行個體的認證。將資料庫移轉到 Azure SQL 時，將會使用此認證。
按一下以檢視錯誤詳細資料
對移轉體驗的意見反應

trans-unit.source: We have completed the assessment of your SQL Server instance '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 我們已對您的 SQL Server 執行個體 '{0}' 完成評定。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid Azure account.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的 Azure 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid blob container for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取來源資料庫 '{0}' 的有效 Blob 容器。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid last backup file for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取來源資料庫 '{0}' 的上一個有效備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid backup folder for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取來源資料庫 '{0}' 的有效備份資料夾。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid resource group for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取來源資料庫 '{0}' 的有效資源群組。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid storage account for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取來源資料庫 '{0}' 的有效儲存體帳戶。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid location.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的位置。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid managed instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的受控執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Select a valid Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 選取有效的資料庫移轉服務。

trans-unit.source: Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.
trans-unit.target: 選取連線到節點的資料庫移轉服務。

trans-unit.source: Invalid network share location format. Example: {0}
trans-unit.target: 網路共用位置格式無效。範例: {0}

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a blob container where all the backup files are page blobs for source database '{0}', as block blobs are supported only for targets running SQL Server 2016 or later. Learn more: https://aka.ms/dms-migrations-troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取 Blob 容器 (其中所有備份檔案都是來源資料庫 '{0}' 的分頁 Blob)，因為只有執行 SQL Server 2016 或更新版本的目標才支援區塊 Blob。深入了解: https://aka.ms/dms-migrations-troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: Cannot connect to the database due to invalid OwnerUri (Parameter 'OwnerUri')
trans-unit.target: 因為 OwnerUri 無效，所以無法連線到資料庫 (參數 'OwnerUri')

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid resource group.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的資源群組。

trans-unit.source: Cannot retrieve saved session. Try again by selecting new session.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取已儲存的工作階段。請選取新的工作階段，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid name for the Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 為此移轉服務輸入有效的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid Azure SQL Database server.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的 Azure SQL Database 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid storage account.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的儲存體帳戶。

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid subscription.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的訂用帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid name for the target database.
trans-unit.target: 輸入有效的目標資料庫名稱。
使用者帳戶格式無效。範例: {0}

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請選取有效的虛擬機器。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務可協調資料庫移轉活動並追蹤其進度。如果您之前已建立資料庫移轉服務，可選取現有的資料庫移轉服務，或是在下方建立一個新的。

trans-unit.source: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one.
trans-unit.target: 找不到任何資料庫移轉服務。建立新的。

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Use this key to register your integration runtime
trans-unit.target: 步驟 2: 使用此金鑰，註冊您的整合執行階段

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime
trans-unit.target: 步驟 3: 按一下 [測試連接] 按鈕，檢查 Azure 資料庫移轉服務與整合執行階段之間的連線

trans-unit.source: Last applied backup files taken on
trans-unit.target: 上次套用的備份檔案建立於

trans-unit.source: Learn more about things you need before starting a migration.
trans-unit.target: 在開始移轉之前，深入了解您需要的事項。
載入移轉清單時發生錯誤

trans-unit.source: Select the target database where you would like to migrate your source database to. You can choose a target database for only one source database.
trans-unit.target: 選取您要將來源資料庫移轉至的目標資料庫位置。您只能為一個來源資料庫選擇目標資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Map selected source databases to target databases for migration
trans-unit.target: 將選取的來源資料庫對應到目標資料庫以進行移轉

trans-unit.source: The managed instance '{0}' is unavailable for migration because it is currently in the '{1}' state. To continue, select an available managed instance.
trans-unit.target: 受控執行個體 '{0}' 無法用於移轉，因為它目前處於 '{1}' 狀態。若要繼續，請選取可用的受控執行個體。
資料庫移轉正在進行中

trans-unit.source: To continue, enter a valid target password.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請輸入有效的目標密碼。

trans-unit.source: To continue, enter a valid target user name.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續，請輸入有效的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: All steps completed with the following error(s):{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: 所有步驟都已完成，但發生以下錯誤:{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: My database backups are in an Azure Storage Blob Container
trans-unit.target: 我的資料庫備份位於 Azure 儲存體 Blob 容器中

trans-unit.source: My database backups are on a network share
trans-unit.target: 我的資料庫備份位於網路共用

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure Storage account where the backups will be uploaded to.
trans-unit.target: 請提供要將備份上傳到的目標 Azure 儲存體帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Provide the network share location where the backups are stored, and the user credentials used to access the share.
trans-unit.target: 提供儲存備份的網路共用位置，以及用來存取共用的使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: Network share path for your database backups. The migration process will automatically retrieve valid backup files from this network share.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫備份的網路共用路徑。移轉程式會自動從此網路共用中擷取有效的備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Network share location where the backups are stored
trans-unit.target: 儲存備份的網路共用位置

trans-unit.source: Enter target database name and network share path information for the selected source databases.
trans-unit.target: 輸入所選源資料庫的目標資料庫名稱和網路共用路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Windows user account with read access to the network share location.
trans-unit.target: 具有網路共用位置讀取存取權的 Windows 使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Windows user account with read access to the network share location
trans-unit.target: 具有網路共用位置讀取存取權的 Windows 使用者帳戶。
找不到任何 Blob 容器。
找不到任何 BLOb 檔案。
找不到 Blob 資料夾。

trans-unit.target: 找不到移轉到 Azure SQL 受控執行個體的問題。

trans-unit.source: No issues found for migrating to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: 找不到移轉到 Azure SQL Database 的問題。

找不到任何受控執行個體。

trans-unit.source: No pending backups. Click refresh to check current status.
trans-unit.target: 沒有擱置的備份。按一下 [重新整理] 以檢查目前的狀態。
找不到 Azure SQL 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: No Azure SQL database servers found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 Azure SQL Database 伺服器。
找不到任何儲存體帳戶。

trans-unit.target: 開啟移轉詳細資料對話方塊時發生錯誤
開啟移轉服務對話方塊時發生錯誤
開啟移轉目標本時發生錯誤
下載並安裝整合執行階段

trans-unit.source: An Azure account (not required for assessment or SKU recommendation functionality)
trans-unit.target: Azure 帳戶 (評定或 SKU 建議功能不需要)

trans-unit.source: A source SQL Server database(s) running on on-premises, or on SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine or any virtual machine running in the cloud (private, public).
trans-unit.target: 在內部部署或 Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server 上執行的來源 SQL Server 資料庫，或雲端中執行的任何虛擬機器 (私人、公用)。

trans-unit.source: An Azure SQL Managed Instance, SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine, or Azure SQL Database to migrate your database(s) to.
trans-unit.target: 要移轉資料庫的目標 Azure SQL 受控執行個體、Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server 或 Azure SQL 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Your database backup location details, either a network file share or an Azure Blob Storage container (not required for Azure SQL Database targets).
trans-unit.target: 您的資料庫備份位置詳細資料，網路檔案共用或 Azure Blob 儲存體容器 (Azure SQL Database 目標不需要)。

trans-unit.source: Things you need before starting your Azure SQL migration:
trans-unit.target: 開始 Azure SQL 移轉之前所需的項目:

trans-unit.source: Provide a unique container for each target database. Databases affected:
trans-unit.target: 為每個目標資料庫提供唯一的容器。受影響的資料庫:

trans-unit.source: Select the operation you'd like to perform.
An error occurred while refreshing the migrations list. Please check your linked Azure connection and click refresh to try again.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理移轉清單時發生錯誤'。 請檢查您的連結 Azure 連線，然後按一下 [重新整理] 再試一次。

trans-unit.source: An error has occured while refreshing the migrations list.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理移轉清單時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A resource group is a container that holds related resources for an Azure solution.
trans-unit.target: 資源群組是能夠存放 Azure 解決方案相關資源的容器。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while retrying the migration.
We are running the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 我們正在執行以下步驟:
已成功將評定報告儲存至 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Configuration saved. Performance data collection will remain running in the background. You can stop the collection when you want to.
trans-unit.target: 已儲存設定。效能資料收集仍會在背景執行。您可以在想要時停止集合。
已成功將建議報告儲存至 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure subscription and your target Azure SQL Managed Instance.
trans-unit.target: 選取您的目標 Azure 訂用帳戶以及目標 Azure SQL 受控執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure Subscription and your target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine for your target.
trans-unit.target: 選取您的目標 Azure 訂用帳戶，以及 Azure 虛擬機器上的目標 SQL Server 作為您的目標。

trans-unit.source: Please select 1 or more logins for migration
trans-unit.target: 請選取 1 或多個要移轉的登入

trans-unit.source: Click on SQL Server instance or any of the databases on the left to view its details.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 SQL Server 執行個體或左邊任何資料庫，以檢視其詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Filter the migration list by Database Migration Service
trans-unit.target: 依資料庫移轉服務篩選移轉清單

trans-unit.source: Sign into Azure and select an account
trans-unit.target: 登入 Azure 並選取帳戶

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available Azure accounts.
trans-unit.target: 載入可用的 Azure 帳戶時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading locations. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 載入位置時發生錯誤。請檢查您的 Azure 連線，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available resource groups. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 載入可用的資源群組時發生錯誤。請檢查您的 Azure 連線，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available database migration services. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 載入可用的資料庫移轉服務時發生錯誤。請檢查您的 Azure 連線，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading account subscriptions. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 載入帳戶訂閱時發生錯誤。請檢查您的 Azure 連線，然後再試一次。
選取目標 Azure SQL 類型

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available Azure account tenants.
trans-unit.target: 載入可用的 Azure 帳戶租用戶時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the service account running the source SQL Server instance has read privileges on the network share.
trans-unit.target: 請確認執行來源 SQL Server 執行個體的服務帳戶對網路共用有讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network file share to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務利用 Azure Data Factory 的自我裝載整合執行階段，將備份從內部部署網路檔案共用上傳到 Azure。

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
trans-unit.target: 請遵循下列指示設定自我裝載整合執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Authentication keys used to connect to the self-hosted integration runtime node
trans-unit.target: 用來連線到自我裝載整合執行個體節點的驗證金鑰
自我裝載整合執行階段節點
Azure 資料庫移轉服務 "{0}" 詳細資料:

trans-unit.source: No Migration Services found. To continue, create a new one.
trans-unit.target: 找不到任何移轉服務。若要繼續，請建立一個新的。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務未註冊。Azure 資料庫移轉服務 '{0}' 必須向在任何節點上的自我裝載整合執行階段註冊。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' is connected to self-hosted integration runtime running on the node - {1}
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務 '{0}' 已連線到在節點上執行的自我裝載整合執行階段 - {1}

trans-unit.source: Please select the location of your database backup files before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 請選取資料庫備份檔案的位置，再繼續。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理移轉服務建立狀態時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Enter the information below to add a new Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 請在下方輸入資訊，以新增 Azure 資料庫移轉服務。
建立 Azure 資料庫移轉服務

trans-unit.source: Azure region for your Azure Database Migration Service. This should be the same region as your target Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務的 Azure 區域。這應該是與目標 Azure SQL 相同的區域。
Azure 資料庫移轉服務名稱。

trans-unit.source: Resource group for your Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務的資源群組。

trans-unit.source: Subscription name for your Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Azure 資料庫移轉服務的訂用帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL target selected as default.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目標已選取為預設值。
自我裝載整合執行階段節點
記憶體最佳化進階系列

trans-unit.source: Choose how you want to provide performance data
trans-unit.target: 選擇您要如何提供效能資料

trans-unit.source: Select a folder on your local drive where performance data will be saved
trans-unit.target: 選取本機磁碟機上要儲存效能資料的資料夾

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation requires performance data of SQL server instance to provide target recommendation. Enable performance data collection to receive the target recommendation for the databases you want to migrate. The longer this will be enabled the better the recommendation. You can disable performance data collection at any time.
trans-unit.target: Azure 建議需要 SQL Server 執行個體的效能資料，才能提供目標建議。啟用效能資料收集，以接收您要移轉之資料庫的目標建議。啟用的時間越長，建議越好。您可以隨時停用效能資料收集。

trans-unit.source: You can also choose to select this data from an existing folder, if you have already collected it previously.
trans-unit.target: 如果您先前已收集過此資料，也可以選擇從現有資料夾選取此資料。

trans-unit.source: I already have the performance data
Select a folder on your local drive where previously collected performance data was saved
trans-unit.target: 選取本機磁碟機上儲存先前收集效能資料的資料夾
正在啟動效能資料收集...

trans-unit.source: Initial recommendations will automatically refresh in approximately {0} minute(s).
trans-unit.target: 初始建議將在大約 {0} 分鐘後自動重新整理。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation has been applied using the provided data. Import or collect additional data to refine the recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 已使用提供的資料套用 Azure 建議。匯入或收集其他資料以精簡建議。

trans-unit.source: Data collection in progress. Generating initial recommendations...
trans-unit.target: 正在收集資料。正在產生初始建議...

trans-unit.source: Check back periodically for updated recommendations by pressing the 'Refresh recommendation' button.
trans-unit.target: 按下 [重新整理建議] 按鈕，定期回來查看更新的建議。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation collects and analyzes performance data and then recommends an appropriate sized target in Azure for your workload.
trans-unit.target: Azure 建議會收集及分析效能資料，然後為您的工作負載建議 Azure 中適當大小的目標。

trans-unit.source: Data collection still in progress. Refining existing recommendations...
trans-unit.target: 資料收集仍在進行中。正在精簡現有的建議...

trans-unit.source: Data collection for Azure recommendations has been stopped.
trans-unit.target: Azure 建議的資料集合已停止。
正在停止效能資料收集...

trans-unit.source: Running the performance collection for a longer period of time helps ensure a more accurate recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 長時間執行效能集合有助於確保更精確的建議。

trans-unit.source: Click the button below to import or collect database performance data.
trans-unit.target: 按一下下方按鈕以匯入或收集資料庫效能資料。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation will be displayed once data collection is complete.
trans-unit.target: 資料收集完成後，將會顯示 Azure 建議。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation is not available. Click “Get Azure recommendation” button below
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Azure 建議。按一下下方的 [取得 Azure 建議] 按鈕

trans-unit.source: Azure region for your Azure SQL target. Only regions that contain a target eligible for migration will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure SQL 目標的 Azure 區域。只會顯示包含符合移轉目標的區域。
Azure SQL 受控執行個體
Azure SQL 受控執行個體

trans-unit.source: Elastic recommendation uses an alternate recommendation model which utilizes personalized price-performance profiling against existing on-cloud customers.
trans-unit.target: 彈性建議使用替代建議模型，其針對現有的雲端客戶使用個人化的價格效能分析。

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will include the latest hardware generations that have significantly improved performance and scalability. These SKUs are currently in Preview and may not yet be available in all regions.
trans-unit.target: 啟用此選項將包括具有明顯改善效能和延展性的最新硬體世代。這些 SKU 目前位於預覽階段，可能尚未在所有區域中使用。

trans-unit.source: Percentile of data points to be used during aggregation of the performance data.
trans-unit.target: 在彙總效能資料期間要使用的資料點百分位數。

trans-unit.source: Invalid scale factor. Enter a positive integer value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例無效。輸入正整數值。

trans-unit.source: Change scale factor if you want the Azure recommendation to be a percentage larger or smaller than you current workload.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望 Azure 建議的百分比大於或小於您目前的工作負載，請變更縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Enter the information below to edit the recommendation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 請在下方輸入資訊以編輯建議參數。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance, view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 若要移轉至 Azure SQL 受控執行個體，請檢視評定結果並選取一或多個資料庫。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Database, view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 若要移轉至 Azure SQL Database，請檢視評定結果並選取一或多個資料庫。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine, view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 若要移轉至 Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server，請檢視評定結果並選取一或多個資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Your Azure SQL target resource name
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure SQL 目標資源名稱

trans-unit.source: Resource group for your Azure SQL target. Only resource groups that contain a target eligible for migration will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure SQL 目標的資源群組。只會顯示包含符合移轉目標的資源群組。

trans-unit.source: Subscription name for your Azure SQL target
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目標的訂用帳戶名稱

trans-unit.source: Place tempdb on the local ephemeral SSD (default D:\) drive
trans-unit.target: 將 tempdb 放在本機暫時 SSD (預設 D:\) 磁碟機上

trans-unit.source: Below is the target storage configuration required to meet your storage performance needs.
trans-unit.target: 以下是滿足儲存體效能需求所需的目標儲存體設定。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup files.
trans-unit.target: 輸入用來連線到 SQL Server 執行個體 {0} 的 SQL 驗證認證。這些認證將用來連線到 SQL Server 執行個體，並識別有效的備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Enter the Windows Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup files.
trans-unit.target: 輸入用來連線到 SQL Server 執行個體 {0} 的 Windows 驗證認證。這些認證將用來連線到 SQL Server 執行個體，並識別有效的備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: For target servers running SQL Server 2014 or below, you must store your database backups in an Azure Storage Blob Container instead of uploading them using the network share option. Additionally, you must store the backup files as page blobs, as block blobs are supported only for targets running SQL Server 2016 or later. Learn more: {0}
trans-unit.target: 對於執行 SQL Server 2014 或更低版本的目標伺服器，您必須將資料庫備份儲存在 Azure 儲存體 Blob 容器中，而非使用網路共用選項將其上傳。此外，您必須將備份檔案儲存為分頁 Blob，因為只有執行 SQL Server 2016 或更新版本的目標才支援區塊 Blob。深入了解: {0}
已知問題、限制和疑難排解

trans-unit.source: The SQL database server '{0}' is unavailable for migration because it is currently in the '{1}' state. To continue, select an available SQL database server.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database 伺服器 '{0}' 無法用於移轉，因為它目前處於'{1}'狀態。若要繼續，請選取可用的 SQL Database 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Validating and migrating logins are in progress

trans-unit.target: 移轉資料庫的憑證時發生錯誤 {0}。{1}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while starting the certificate migration: '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 啟動憑證移轉時發生錯誤: '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Add your Azure account to view existing migrations and their status.
trans-unit.target: 新增您的 Azure 帳戶以檢視現有的移轉及其狀態。

trans-unit.source: Select a Database Migration Service to monitor migrations.
trans-unit.target: 選取要監視移轉的資料庫移轉服務。
Azure SQL 受控執行個體

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虛擬機器上的 SQL Server
將登入移轉至 Azure SQL
資料表移轉狀態詳細資料

trans-unit.source: Missing target tables excluded from list: {0}
trans-unit.target: 清單中排除的遺失目標資料表: {0}
已選取 {0} 個資料表 (共 {1} 個資料表)

trans-unit.source: Certificates migration was canceled. Please run and complete the certificates migration to continue.
trans-unit.target: 憑證移轉已取消。請執行並完成憑證移轉再繼續。

trans-unit.source: Validation was canceled with the following error(s):{0}{1}
Migration completed with the following error(s):{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: 移轉完成，發生以下錯誤:{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: Migrating the certificates from the following databases:
trans-unit.target: 正在從下列資料庫移轉憑證:

trans-unit.source: Certificates migration has not been run for the current configuration. Please run and complete the certificates migration to continue.
trans-unit.target: 尚未針對目前的設定執行憑證移轉。請執行並完成憑證移轉以繼續。
憑證移轉進度詳細資料:

trans-unit.source: Certificates migration completed successfully. Please click Next to proceed with the migration.
trans-unit.target: 憑證移轉已成功完成。 請按 [下一步] 繼續移轉。

trans-unit.source: {0} Transparent Data Encryption enabled databases selected for migration. {1}
trans-unit.target: {0} 已選取啟用 [透明資料加密] 的資料庫來進行移轉。{1}

trans-unit.source: You have chosen to manually migrate certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您已選擇手動移轉憑證。

trans-unit.source: You have given access to Azure Data Studio to migrate the encryption certificates and database.
trans-unit.target: 您取得 Azure Data Studio 的存取權，可移轉加密憑證和資料庫。

trans-unit.source: {0} out of {1} selected database(s) is using transparent data encryption.
trans-unit.target: {0} 個 (共 {1} 個資料庫) 選取的資料庫正在使用透明資料加密。

trans-unit.source: To migrate an encrypted database successfully you need to provide access to the encryption certificates or migrate certificates manually before proceeding with the migration. {0}.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功移轉加密的資料庫，您必須先提供加密憑證的存取權或手動移轉憑證，才能繼續移轉。{0}。

trans-unit.source: Network path where certificate will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 放置憑證的網路路徑位置。

trans-unit.source: Export my certificates and private key to the target.
trans-unit.target: 將我的憑證和私密金鑰匯出到目標。

trans-unit.source: I give consent to use my credentials for accessing the certificates.
trans-unit.target: 我同意使用我的登入資訊來存取憑證。

trans-unit.source: I don't want Azure Data Studio to export the certificates.
trans-unit.target: 我不要 Azure Data Studio 匯出憑證。

trans-unit.source: You must migrate the certificates before proceeding with the migration otherwise the migration will fail. {0}.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先移轉憑證再繼續執行移轉，否則移轉將會失敗。{0}.

trans-unit.source: Select a unique name for this target database
trans-unit.target: 為此目標資料庫選取唯一的名稱

trans-unit.source: A time-out was encountered while validating a resource connection. Learn more: https://aka.ms/dms-migrations-troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: 驗證資源連線時發生逾時。深入了解: https://aka.ms/dms-migrations-troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: Validation completed with the following error(s):{0}{1}

trans-unit.target: 驗證檢查錯誤{0}來源資料庫: {1}{0}目標資料庫: {2}{0}錯誤: {3} - {4}

trans-unit.source: Validation check error{0}Source database: {1}{0}File share path: {2}{0}Error: {3} - {4}
trans-unit.target: 驗證檢查錯誤{0}來源資料庫: {1}{0}檔案共用路徑: {2}{0}錯誤: {3} - {4}
整合執行階段連線能力

trans-unit.source: Validation was canceled. Please run and validate the migration settings to continue.
trans-unit.target: 驗證已取消。請執行並驗證移轉設定以繼續。

trans-unit.source: Validation was canceled with the following error(s):{0}{1}
Validation has not been run for the current configuration. Please run and validate the migration settings to continue.
trans-unit.target: 尚未針對目前的設定執行驗證。請執行並驗證移轉設定以繼續。

trans-unit.source: Validation completed successfully. Please click Next to proceed with the migration.
trans-unit.target: 驗證已成功完成。 請按 [下一步] 繼續移轉。

trans-unit.source: The virtual machine '{0}' is unavailable for migration because the SQL Server IaaS Agent extension is currently in '{1}' mode instead of Full mode. Learn more: https://aka.ms/sql-iaas-extension
trans-unit.target: 虛擬機器 '{0}' 無法移轉，因為 SQL Server IaaS 代理程式延伸項目目前處於 '{1}' 模式，而不是完整模式。深入了解: https://aka.ms/sql-iaas-extension

trans-unit.source: The virtual machine '{0}' is unavailable for migration because the underlying virtual machine is not running. Please make sure it is powered on before retrying.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬機器 '{0}' 無法用於移轉，因為基礎虛擬機器未執行。請確定電源已開啟，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.
trans-unit.target: 請選取連結到 Azure Data Studio 的 Azure 帳戶，或立即連結一個。

trans-unit.source: Add a linked account and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 新增連結的帳戶，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while connecting to the target server.
trans-unit.target: 連線到目標伺服器時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to get {0} login information.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得 {0} 登入資訊時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source:
Error(s) occurred while collecting performance data for the server '{0}'. If these issues persist, try restarting the data collection process:
{1}
trans-unit.target:
收集伺服器 '{0}' 的效能資料時發生錯誤。如果這些問題持續發生，請嘗試重新啟動資料收集程式：
{1}

trans-unit.source: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your databases in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 根據評定結果，您所有在線上狀態的 {0} 個資料庫都可以移轉到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 評定伺服器 '{0}' 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Check this option to skip assessment and continue the migration.
trans-unit.target: 核取此選項以略過評定並繼續移轉。

trans-unit.source: [There are no assessment results to validate readiness of your database migration. By checking this box, you acknowledge you want to proceed migrating your database to the desired Azure SQL target.]
trans-unit.target: [沒有評定結果可驗證資料庫移轉的整備程度。選取此方塊，即表示您確認要繼續將資料庫移轉至所需的 Azure SQL 目標。]

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.{3}Message: {1}{3}stack: {2}
trans-unit.target: 評定伺服器 '{0}' 時發生意外的錯誤。{3}訊息: {1}{3}堆疊: {2}
選擇您的 Azure SQL 目標

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while generating SKU recommendations for the server '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 產生伺服器 '{0}' 的 SKU 建議時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: No SKU recommendations were generated, as there were no SKUs which could satisfy the performance characteristics of your source. Try selecting a different target platform, adjusting recommendation parameters, selecting a different set of databases to assess, or changing the recommendation model.
trans-unit.target: 未產生 SKU 建議，因為沒有可滿足您來源效能特性的 SKU。請嘗試選取不同的目標平台、調整建議參數、選取不同的資料庫集進行評估或變更建議模型。

trans-unit.source: Connection was successful but did not find any target databases.
trans-unit.target: 連線成功，但找不到任何目標資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Connection was successful. Target databases found: {0}
trans-unit.target: 連線成功。找到目標資料庫: {0}

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account and your target {0}.
trans-unit.target: 選取 Azure 帳戶和您的目標 {0}。
取得登入資訊時發生錯誤: {0}

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Target database '{0}' cannot be selected to as a migration target for database '{1}'. Target database '{2}' is already selected as a migration target for database '{3}'. Please select a different target database.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫對應錯誤。無法選取目標資料庫 '{0}' 做為資料庫 '{1}' 的移轉目標。已選取目標資料庫 '{2}' 做為資料庫 '{3}' 的移轉目標。請選取其他目標資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Missing target databases to migrate. Please configure the target server connection and click connect to collect the list of available database migration targets.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫對應錯誤。缺少要移轉的目標資料庫。 請設定目標伺服器連線，然後按一下 [連線] 以收集可用的資料庫移轉目標清單。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error (Error code: {0}) was found between '{1}' and '{2}' databases. The source database collation '{3}' does not match the target database collation '{4}'. Please select or re-create a target database with the same collation as the source database.
trans-unit.target: 在 '{1}' 與 '{2}' 資料庫之間發現資料庫對應錯誤 (錯誤碼: {0})。來源資料庫定序 '{3}' 不符合目標資料庫定序 '{4}'。請選取或重新建立具有與來源資料庫相同定序的目標資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Source database '{0}' is not mapped to a target database. Please select a target database to migrate to.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫對應錯誤。來源資料庫 '{0}' 未對應到目標資料庫。請選取要移轉至的目標資料庫。
已選取 {0} 個資料庫 (共 {1} 個)
正在等候 {0} 元件啟動。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while starting the migration: '{0}'

trans-unit.target: 正在開始將資料庫 {0} 移轉到 {1} - {2}
開啟 Azure SQL 移轉筆記本
資料庫移轉服務詳細資料
